title: Jobwrite
description: Challenging the traditional job search process, Jobwrite was build to offer job seekers a platform to get personalized job recommendations based on their GitHub profile.

title: Slotlot
description: Slotlot is a mobile app built to address the parking issues faced in India. It makes parking process a lot more easier by not only providing realtime details like lot availability but also automatically manages and assign slots upon vehicle entry.

title: Holostry
description: As a kid I hated chemistry, and I know I'm not alone. So I along with my friends, built Holostry - a hologram based learning app, so you can visualize chemical components in 3D and understand them better. Thus making chemistry easy and fun.
